wikipedia_page.main:
Lindsay Wood is a Scottish curler.
She is a 2007 World bronze medallist and a 2007 European silver medallist.

Lead: Lindsay Wood

Schafer won her first medal at an international event at the 2007 World Women's Curling Championship. She skipped Scotland with teammates Jackie Lockhart, Lorna Vevers, Lindsay Wood and Karen Addison. Scotland won the bronze medal by losing in the semi-final to Denmark, skipped by Angelina Jensen.

Lindsay Wood (born 12 May 1961) was an English cricketer. He was a left-handed batsman and a left-arm slow bowler who played for Kent and Derbyshire.Lindsay Wood, CricketArchive. Retrieved 2020-06-06.
